text: Peter Bailey on NUM sharing their thoughts regarding  #Grayston #BridgeCollapse | Watch #DStv405 pic.twitter.com/zZdY5j0QYi
19h37 is the time I arrived home, being affected by the #BridgeCollapse
This #BridgeCollapse is really bad you could see that the structure was not ok, I'm no engineer but hayi it was obvious
As if being fined twice for collusive tendering was not enough! Now #Murray&Roberts is building sub standard structures! #BridgeCollapse
I'm waiting for tweeps like Siz to tweet about deflection, bending moment, design shape codes. etc  #BridgeCollapse
I wish to extend my heartfelt condolences to the family of the deceased, further prayers and thoughts to the injured ones #BridgeCollapse
